summary: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.
cast: Paul Reubens|Elizabeth Daily|Mark Holton|Diane Salinger|Judd Omen|Irving Hellman|Monte Landis|Damon Martin|David Glasser|Gregory Brown|Mark Everett|Daryl Keith Roach|Bill Cable|Peter Looney|Starletta DuPois|Professor Toru Tanaka|Ed Herlihy|Ralph Seymour|Lou Cutell|Raymond Martino|Erica Yohn|Bill W. title: La gran aventura de Pee-wee
